name: rbe
title: Rivals Board Enhancements
description: This extension adds a number of enhancements to the new rivals message board
author: msudude

preferences.name: hide-sidebar
preferences.title: Hide Sidebar
preferences.description: Hide the rightmost sidebar in all views

preferences.name: micro
preferences.title: Remove Headers and Footers
preferences.description: Remove page header and footer and unneeded whitespace

preferences.name: white-background
preferences.title: White Background
preferences.description: Display white background instead of off-grey in page margins

preferences.name: striped
preferences.title: Striped Rows
preferences.description: Stripe alternating rows of threads and posts

preferences.name: compact-forum
preferences.title: Compact Forum
preferences.description: Compress thread title, starter, and time to one line. Remove additional padding

preferences.name: compact-sticky-heading
preferences.title: Minimize Sticky Separation
preferences.description: Minimize separation between sticky and normal threads

preferences.name: hide-sticky-heading
preferences.title: Hide Sticky Separation
preferences.description: Remove separation between sticky and normal threads

preferences.name: page-buttons-visible
preferences.title: Show Page Buttons
preferences.description: Always show page buttons for multi-page threads

preferences.name: highlight-viewed-threads
preferences.title: Highlight New Post Threads
preferences.description: Highlight threads that you've viewed that have new posts

preferences.name: compact-thread
preferences.title: Compact Posts
preferences.description:: Remove excess whitespace in and around posts

preferences.name: collapse-user-info
preferences.title: Collapse User Info
preferences.description: Collapse the user info in thread view. Details can be shown by hovering over the user avatar

preferences.name: leave-badge-visible
preferences.title: Show Badges
preferences.description: Leave the member/moderator badges visible when collapsing user info

preferences.name: replace-avatars
preferences.title: Square Avatars
preferences.description: Replace round avatars with square versions. Gif avatars will work

preferences.name: live-updates
preferences.title: Live Updates
preferences.description: Update threads as new posts are added

preferences.name: live-update-polling-interval
preferences.title: Live Update Polling Interval
preferences.description: Polling interval for live updates in seconds
